nodes.text: The Farfalla skyscraper was an historic skyscraper erected just east of the Presidential Palace on Coruscant.

Erected just east of the Galactic Republic's Presidential Palace, the Farfalla skyscraper was named after the famed Republic hero of the New Sith Wars, Jedi Lord and Master Valenthyne Farfalla. Despite its historical status, the skyscraper was razed in the decade before the Clone Wars by Prince Xizor of Falleen, a powerful Vigo in the crime syndicate Black Sun. On the footprint of the historic tower, Xizor established a massive palace that, while dwarfed by the Supreme Chancellor's palace, towered over the surrounding buildings.
